products.title: SAP SuccessFactors
products.body: SAP SuccessFactors is a complete human capital management (HCM) suite that helps you attract, develop, motivate, and engage a diverse, global workforce.

products.title: SAP Ariba
products.body: SAP Ariba provides market-leading applications for executing source-to-pay processes with integration to suppliers over the world’s largest business network.

products.title: SAP Concur
products.body: SAP Concur provides innovative and actionable tools to help businesses efficiently transact, control, and maximize the value of employee discretionary spend.

products.title: SAP C/4HANA
products.body: SAP C/4HANA is the customer experience suite of five cloud solutions: Commerce Cloud, Marketing Cloud, Customer Data Cloud, Service Cloud, and Sales Cloud.

products.title: SAP Fieldglass
products.body: SAP Fieldglass provides solutions to find, engage, and manage your external workforce and services procurement resources, including temporary staff, consultants, freelancers, contractors, and more.

solutions.title: Record to Report
solutions.body: Finance and accounting mgt process which involves collecting, processing and delivery in relevant timely information used for providing strategic, financial and operational feedback.

solutions.title: Plan to Produce
solutions.body: The business process involved in taking a product from pre-market introduction to on the shelf.  Forecasting, sales operations planning, production planning, procurement, manufacturing.

solutions.title: Lead to Cash
solutions.body: Lead-to-Cash process connects a customer’s interest to buy to a company’s realization of revenue, bringing the front office together with back office.

solutions.title: Total Workforce Management
solutions.body: The process includes all the activities needed to maintain a productive workforce, such as the Core HR management, performance and training management, but also recruiting, forecasting, etc.

solutions.title: Acquire to Retire
solutions.body: Managing the lifecycle of an asset.  Usually a physical asset and generally a piece of equipment, large machine, engine, powerplant.  Procure, build, asset library, maintenance, depreciation, service, replacement parts.

solutions.title: Design to Operate
solutions.body: The classical manufacturing process, starting from Design, over the manufacturing and delivery of an asset, and in the Intelligent Enterprise process cut also the step of finally Operating the asset at customer site is included.

solutions.title: Source to Pay
solutions.body: It’s the entire end-to-end process involved in procurement. It spans every process, from spend management, strategic sourcing, vendor management to purchasing, and performance management.

solutions.title: Information to Insight
solutions.body: Information-to-insight process ranges from managing data storage, governance, and performance to real-time business insights with a digital boardroom.

solutions.title: Message to Market
solutions.body: The process is about understanding and reaching target audiences, aligning messaging to company goals, and ascertaining the differentiating values and benefits of products.
